Hi,

I am doing a school project on windspeed prediction. I would like to u=
se NEAT4J to derive NN.  I am very new to AI and would appreciate some guid=
ance.

Input has:
Day of year
Time of day
Temperature
Relative Humidity
Dew=
 Point
Target wind speed

My questions
a. Should I normalize my inputs to w=
ork with NEAT4J
   Some literature advises against normalizing input if tar=
get values dont have known lower or upper bound

b. How do I extend NEAT4J =
so that output is greater than 1
